status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Slider overlaps the thumbImage when slider properties changed on run time.

This is not a regression. 
Since issue occurs on 3.1.3.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1)KS>Controls>Slider>Basic
2)Change Basic Slider.

Expected Result:
Slider height width and thumb image changes and image must be over the slider.Not behind the slider

Actual Result:
Slider height width and thumb image changes but slider overlaps the slider.
fields.summary: iOS: Slider: Slider overlaps the thumbImage when custom image changed on run time
